topic.Fr: Le Channel de Presentation de "Discord Games"

reason.En: The Presentation's Channel is a nice GUI for "Discord Games", easier than by commands
reason.Fr: Le Channel de Presentation est une jolie interface pour "Discord Games", plus simple que par des commandes

presentation.En: Discord games offers a various choice of games
presentation.Fr: Discord games vous proposes divers choix de jeux
